name: The Magician
tagline_logic: Taglines should feel dreamy, abstract, and slightly mystical. Think in metaphor, not message.
tone_flavor: Sounds like a whisper during a foggy walk. Calming, but strange. Language floats more than lands.

blob_behavior.motion: gliding loops with slow phase shifts

logo_direction: Weightless. Could be translucent. Symbol or type, but should evoke transformation or illusion. Expect glow, outline shifts, or mirror-like reflections.
example_headlines: Nothing changes unless you believe it can.
Built from air, born for feeling.

visual_references.name: David Whyte Poetry Experience
visual_references.why_use: This reference captures the softness and poeticism of the Magician. The blurred, painterly illustration and gentle serif copy feel like a spell — ideal for calm, metaphor-driven moments in the brand.

visual_references.name: Cartier Dreamscape
visual_references.why_use: This Cartier hot air balloon design captures lightness, drift, and surrealism. Ideal for magical transitions, loading animations, or immersive scrollytelling sequences.

visual_references.name: Gucci Beauty Enchanted Garden
visual_references.use_case: Fantasy nature environment with glowing light
visual_references.why_use: The Gucci Beauty scene nails Magician aesthetics with its mystical lighting, glowing flora, and twilight palette. Perfect reference for otherworldly product scenes or hero backgrounds.

visual_references.name: DeFi Primitives Portal
visual_references.use_case: Futuristic magical realism with transformative object
visual_references.why_use: This visual blends high-tech with myth. The gliding energy orb feels like a digital ritual. A key reference for combining AI with mysticism or showcasing 'living' digital elements.

visual_references.name: Lusion Labs Storyworld
visual_references.use_case: Whimsical storytelling for onboarding or brand narrative
visual_references.why_use: This soft, narrative world is perfect for brand storytelling sequences or gamified brand interactions. Glowing elements and ambient haze fit Magician visual language perfectly.

visual_references.name: Organimo Wellness
visual_references.why_use: This pink dreamscape merges product clarity with Magician atmosphere. Great for showcasing physical/digital items in a surreal but luxurious space — especially wellness, beauty, or tech products.
